entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 2:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with ice pellets early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:55 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 1:55 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:55 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 1:55 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
